name: questcord-workspace
description: QuestCord workspace with separate production and development environments

scripts.start:prod: cd production && cross-env NODE_ENV=production PORT=3000 node src/index.js
scripts.start:dev: cd development && cross-env NODE_ENV=development PORT=3001 nodemon src/index.js
scripts.deploy:commands:prod: cd production && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node scripts/deploy-commands.js
scripts.deploy:commands:dev: cd development && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node scripts/deploy-commands.js
scripts.init:prod: cd production && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node scripts/init-db.js
scripts.init:dev: cd development && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node scripts/init-db.js
scripts.worker:prod: cd production && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node worker/spawner.js
scripts.worker:dev: cd development && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon worker/spawner.js
scripts.backup:prod: cd production && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node scripts/backup.js
scripts.install:all: npm run install:prod && npm run install:dev
